entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Hopedale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 p.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hopedale 7:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
